responsibilities.1: I have led the development of end-to-end software solutions (Web and PWA) for clients in multiple sectors, managing the entire project lifecycle, from conception to deployment
responsibilities.2: I have managed and executed deployment processes in cloud infrastructures such as AWS (S3, EC2, ElasticBeanstalk) and DigitalOcean, ensuring the configuration, availability and scalability of applications
responsibilities.3: Stacks used was React, TailwindCSS, shadcnUI, MaterialUI, NestJS, GraphQL, Prisma ORM, Redis and PostgreSQL

responsibilities.1: Implemented a complete software solution for meeting management, simplifying the scheduling, organization and visualization processes for employees
responsibilities.2: Developed an application to automate the process of pricing services, ensuring greater accuracy in values and agility in the preparation of commercial proposals
responsibilities.3: Maintained mobile applications, added a credit card payment system
responsibilities.4: Organized and deployed on AWS with S3, EC2, ElasticBeanstalk, among others
responsibilities.5: Stacks used was React, TailwindCSS, Styled-Components, MaterialUI, NestJS, NodeJS, TypeORM, Prisma ORM, Redis, SQL Server and PostgreSQL
